main_definition: Flowers are the reproductive structures of flowering plants (angiosperms) that typically consist of brightly colored petals, a central pistil and numerous stamens.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Metaphorical use to describe something attracting attention or admiration
meanings_and_examples.example: The new design of the car received many compliments; it truly is a flower among vehicles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expression of happiness, affection, or congratulations
meanings_and_examples.example: When she got promoted, her colleagues showered her with flowers to celebrate her success.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set or collection of things that are considered good or desirable
meanings_and_examples.example: The local market has a great variety of fresh and colorful flowers available for purchase.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Noun form, referring to the individual blossoms themselves
meanings_and_examples.example: She loves picking different types of flowers from her garden during springtime.
